In singleplayer late game AI spam recruits the best units like the guy said above. Is there an easy way to fix special unit limits, id do it myself if i could
Do you have the PFM ? or get it ; and I will show you how to put back the unit limit

In order to put the DLC limit

open the mod with the Napoleon PFM (not the Empire one)

clic on the db tab
clic on units_tables and open the Tab on the right side
look for the unit Name you want to change the limit in the 2nd Row ; following the line

goto  the row unit Limit units  ;;; 0 (zero) stays for Unlimited ; just put what ever you want instead

now goto MP Unit Limit row (7 row from here on the right) and do exactly  the same thing

save the pack

Tanuser now limit works thanks!!

@ krigla:

Regarding your question on how to make these compatible with other modes...
You could circumvent this by adding the entries for custom_unitsXX from MyNaploc.pack to this file:
http://www.twcenter.net/forums/attachment.php?attachmentid=93440&stc=1&d=1275923093 

That is a "localization" file designed to be compatible with many mods.

Hope this helps, though this is only a workaround to unlocking the units.
